abstract: Citigroup has reportedly been paying London traders millions of dollars in guaranteed bonuses, even as Wall Street’s pay practices are scrutinized in Washington.
snippet: Citigroup has reportedly been paying London traders millions of dollars in guaranteed bonuses, even as Wall Street’s pay practices are scrutinized in Washington.
lead_paragraph: As Washington puts Wall Street pay practices in the spotlight, Forbes is reporting on hefty sign-on bonuses that Citigroup — which was bailed out multiple times by the federal government — is doling out in London.

headline.main: Citi Said to Dangle Bonuses in London
